metadata.title: CVE-2021-47432 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:lib/generic-radix-tree.c: Don't overflow in peek()When we started spreading new inode numbers throughout most of the 64bit inode space, that triggered some corner case bugs, in particularsome integer overflows related to the radix tree code. Oops.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
